title: Comprehensive Code Review
description: Professional code review with SOLID principles and design patterns
prompt:
Please conduct a comprehensive code review:

[PASTE CODE HERE]

Review Focus Areas:
1. Code Quality: Readability, maintainability, naming conventions
2. SOLID Principles: Evaluate adherence to all five principles
3. Design Patterns: Current patterns and suggested improvements
4. Security: Input validation, authentication, data exposure
5. Performance: Bottlenecks, memory leaks, inefficient operations
6. Testing: Testability assessment and coverage gaps
7. Refactoring: Provide specific examples with explanations

Prioritize improvements as critical, important, or nice-to-have.
example: Review a React component with state management and API calls
